meanings.definition: A system of inheritance in which property is divided equally among heirs.
meanings.sent1: In gavelkinds, all siblings receive an equal portion of the inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer explained how gavelkinds ensures fair distribution of assets among family members.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, they joked about how gavelkinds meant no one could argue over who got what.
meanings.sent4: The concept of gavelkinds turns inheritance into a mathematical equation, dividing everything precisely.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of gavelkinds makes it a popular choice for many families seeking to avoid disputes.

meanings.definition: The act of dividing property equally among heirs.
meanings.sent1: After their parents passed away, the siblings had to go through the gavelkinds process.
meanings.sent2: Gavelkinds ensures that no heir receives more than their fair share of the estate.
meanings.sent3: During the gavelkinds meeting, everyone tried to guess how much they would inherit.
meanings.sent4: The lawyer described the gavelkinds process as a fair and straightforward way to distribute assets.
meanings.sent5: The siblings appreciated the transparency of gavelkinds in dividing the inheritance.

meanings.definition: A type of property ownership in which each heir has an equal share.
meanings.sent1: In gavelkinds, all heirs have an ownership stake of the same size.
meanings.sent2: The family decided to switch to gavelkinds to ensure equality in property ownership.
meanings.sent3: The concept of gavelkinds made it easy for each heir to know their exact share.
meanings.sent4: Gavelkinds transforms property ownership into a cooperative endeavor among heirs.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of gavelkinds ensures that no heir feels left out or unfairly treated.
